Comment: (litː ''one hand complete, the other hand one (finger)'')
(cf. number 5 for the merging of phonemes)
(litː ''two hands, foot one (appendage)'', shortened form would be dʉpo hikaɡa pedĩtuaro )
(litː ''two hands complete, one foot complete, other foot one appendage'', shortened form would readː ape dʉpo hikaɡa pedĩtuaro)
(litː ''one person as many as, or ''all twenty appendages'')
